member.name: T:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter
member.summary: This converts a directory (and optionally the sub-directories) of SVG files to XAML files in a specified directory, maintaining the original directory structure.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.#ctor(SharpVectors.Renderers.Wpf.WpfDrawingSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified drawing or rendering settings.
member.param: This specifies the settings used by the rendering or drawing engine. If this is , the default settings is used.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.Recursive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the directory copying is recursive, that is includes the sub-directories.
member.value: This property is if the sub-directories are included in the directory copy; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.Overwrite
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an existing file is overwritten.
member.value: This property is if existing file is overwritten; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.IncludeSecurity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the security settings of the copied file is retained.
member.value: This property is if the security settings of the file is also copied; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.IncludeHidden
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the copy operation includes hidden directories and files.
member.value: This property is if hidden directories and files are included in the copy operation; otherwise, it is . The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.WriterErrorOccurred
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a writer error occurred when using the custom XAML writer.
member.value: This is if an error occurred when using the custom XAML writer; otherwise, it is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.FallbackOnWriterError
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to fall back and use the .NET Framework XAML writer when an error occurred in using the custom writer.
member.value: This is if the converter falls back to using the system XAML writer when an error occurred in using the custom writer; otherwise, it is . If , an exception, which occurred in using the custom writer will be thrown. The default is .

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.SourceDir
member.summary: Gets the source directory of the SVG files to be converted.
member.value: A specifying the source directory of the SVG files.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.DestinationDir
member.summary: Gets the destination directory of the converted XAML files.
member.value: A specifying the destination directory of the converted XAML files.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.ErrorFile
member.summary: Gets the full path of the last SVG file not successfully converted.
member.value: A string containing the full path of the last SVG file not successfully converted to the XAML
member.remarks: Whenever an error occurred in the conversion of a file, the conversion process will stop. Use this property to retrieve the full path of the SVG file causing the error.

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.DirectorySvgConverter.Convert(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Convert the SVG files in the specified source directory, saving the results in the specified destination directory.
member.param: A specifying the source directory of the SVG files.
A specifying the source directory of the SVG files.
member.exception: If the directory specified by does not exists.

summary.para: This converts an SVG file to the corresponding XAML file, which can be viewed in WPF application.
The root object in the converted file is .

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.FileSvgReader.Save(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Saves the last converted file to the specified file name.
member.param: The full path of the output file.
A value indicating whether to save the output to XAML file.
A value indicating whether to save the output to ZAML file, which is a G-zip compression of the XAML file.
member.returns: This returns if either or is and the operation is successful.

remarks.para: If the output serialization properties are not enabled, this method can be used to save the output to a file.
This will not change the output serialization properties of this object.

member.exception: If there is no converted drawing from a previous conversion process to be saved.

member.name: F:SharpVectors.Converters.ImageEncoderType.WmpBitmap
member.summary: Specifies an encoder that is used to Microsoft Windows Media Photo (WDP) images, that is .

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.#ctor

member.name: M:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.#cctor
member.summary: Static constructor to define metadata for the control (and link it to the style in Generic.xaml).

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the SVG file to load into this .
member.value: A specifying the path to the SVG source file. The file can be located on a computer, network or assembly resources. Settings this to will close any opened diagram.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.StreamSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the to the SVG source to load into this .
member.value: A specifying the stream to the SVG source. Settings this to will close any opened diagram.

remarks.para: The stream source has precedence over the Uri property. If set (not ), the stream source will be rendered instead of the Uri source.

WPF controls do not implement the interface and cannot properly dispose any stream set to it. To avoid this issue and also any problem of the user accidentally closing the stream, this control makes a copy of the stream to memory stream.

member.name: P:SharpVectors.Converters.SvgCanvas.AutoSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to automatically resize this based on the size of the loaded drawing.
